website_summaries.verdict: The active alternative to the commonplace chunky Pikachu, this electric mouse is a cute plush that Pokémon fans of all ages will love.

customer_reviews.title: I choose you Pikachu!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2-year old son since we enjoying watching Pokemon XY but when the series ended with XYZ and started up again with that ridiculous Sun & Moon version we both cried. It's just I miss the old gang so much!! This Pikachu helps ease the pain and depression...that I'm sure my son feels as well...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: A new Pika for my collection
customer_reviews.text: This Pikachu plush is extremely soft and looks exactly like the image shown. The tail is a bit floppy and does not stand up without careful placement, but it hardly detracts from how cute it is. This particular plush caught my eye since it is indeed from the Pokemon Center in Japan, and has a more unique pose than most Pikachu plush. He is a welcome addition to my Pikachu collection and will be to yours, as well. <3 edit: It's worth noting that you can now buy this cheaper on pokemoncenter.com if you're in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: True to the Character
customer_reviews.text: Pikachu's proportions are perfect. The stitching on the expression is quality. This costs more than some of the other Pikachus, but I'd rather have correct proportions for $24 than some globby pikachuesque thing. It is pretty small, but that was perfect for my purposes because the 4 year old that loves it is also small.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT A DECENT SIZE TOY!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO SMALL! I was expecting something much larger, but when it arrived it was tiny. Dimensions are in centimeters, not inches. If I had time, I would send this back, but its close to Christmas, so now I'll just have to get a couple more things to make up for how small this is. If you're looking for a decent size Pikachu, this is NOT what you want. And for the size, its WAY too expensive. Look around and you'll find ones the same size for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It isn't as big as I hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Granddaughter she loved it it is the perfect size! I can't always be there to hug her so this helps her! She sure loves it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Shining Woman

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive, but SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and cuddly little cute-stuff. Exactly as shown and described. Note that the listed body size is in centimeters - not inches. The body alone is about 7-inches, and the whole thing is 12-inches from the tip of its nose to the tip of its tail. The tail is not rigid, so it doesn't stay up on its own, but as such it is as soft and cuddly as the rest of the plushy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cool Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, I don't think it was pricey like others say but I guess for some people awesome cars aren't pricey and I have a junk car lol. Loved it though, for me it was relatively easy to get the tail how I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra V

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My daughter loves it! Hope it can also come in bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: linnn

customer_reviews.title: Small but lovable!
customer_reviews.text: Small for how much it was! But my son absolutely loves it. Brings it everywhere. Pretty durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Allisa McAleese

customer_reviews.title: It was super fun
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old said..It was the best Pokémon plush it was so cute I love it I all ways play with it but it’s a good thing
customer_reviews.author: davi_music

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Pickachu, he is very well made. The stiching is strong, the material is soft. I love it. I waited until the price dropped to a reasonable amount before I bought it. I bought mine at about $22. The size was also exactly what I expected it to be. It is small, but that does not bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: This is literally the cutest pikachu doll ever and is nicely made. However
customer_reviews.text: Okay. This is literally the cutest pikachu doll ever and is nicely made. However, it's waaaaay smaller than the description. I took a pic next to a Xbox controller for scale. I would give it 3 stars only because the size is wrong but it's seriously so cute I could die. My son is going to love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: He sits on my desk at work being adorable. Not too big which is good for conserving desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves him
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made stuffed Pikachu. It isn't very big, but the size is still decent. He got him around Christmas and 7 months later is still in great condition. His "fur" is very soft. The price is well worth it based on the popularity and more so the quality of materials. He's gotten a bit dirty, but my son used a wet washcloth and it cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jmes

customer_reviews.title: This is very nice doll and has much detail on it
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice doll and has much detail on it! However, his tail does not stay up in the air as pictured and he is quite small. I thought he would be a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Ondre' D Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: I'm such a fool. I thought If it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm such a fool. I thought If it was 38 dollars that it would be a decent size and I thought I checked the size. But I must have gotten distracted or something. It is TINY Worth $20 tops. Luckily I got it for a birthday present and it arrived late so I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Came just as advertised. A bit expensive for the size of the product, but would order it again regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Leeper

customer_reviews.title: But pikachu is great. He is very soft too
customer_reviews.text: He arrived fast and safe. Wrapped in tons of bubble wrap. :) the only odd thing was a got a picture of a Japanese man with a big bag of purchased stuff.. I'm not sure why. Gave me a giggle. It was just random. But pikachu is great. He is very soft too. I love him.
customer_reviews.author: Nyytmaris Stormchaser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old loved it! Good quality and soft. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Demetral

customer_reviews.title: WRONG PRODUCT!!! Be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the completely wrong product. I received a beanie baby instead of the plush. The face and body aren't even correct. Be careful what you order! I had needed this for an event and now I am Pikachu-less because this was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnston

customer_reviews.title: CUTE & COZY
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently became a Pokemon crazed fan. She ordered this and loves it. My thoughts are that it is soft and cozy. No complaints here on either end, hers or mine.
customer_reviews.author: Bexx

customer_reviews.title: I got the wrong item from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong item from Amazon. This was supposed to be a large Pikachu and I got a tiny one. Amazon told me to keep it and refunded my money. The one I got is very small but very cute and sits on a Pokémon Tin in my son's room
customer_reviews.author: PokemomTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture! This is one of the cutest Pikachu toys I have ever seen. Size is small, as others have said. But, that is what I was expecting. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than I thought, but since it's so ...
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought, but since it's so close to Christmas we won't return it due to timing. The measurements are with the tail stretched out, so think about that when picturing the size in your head.
customer_reviews.author: Christy G

customer_reviews.title: But small as noted
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's quite small. However I planned on using it in a cosplay to sit on my shoulder/hat. Because of this the size was okay for me. It's honestly the size of a picku rather than the size of a pikachu.
customer_reviews.author: j hanlon

customer_reviews.title: REALLY SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it was but I will it was bigger for how much I spent on it. However the person I have it to loved it and caries it around everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shamar

customer_reviews.title: TINY must have clarified measurements AFTER we ordered...
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll but must have corrected the dimensions AFTER we purchased. My son and I were under the impression the dimensions were in inches and were disappointed to find they're in centimeters. My boy wouldn't have spent $25 hard-earned dollars on a TINY pokemon. :(
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dysart

customer_reviews.title: very nice product, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Can't complaint....very nice product, as advertised... I would buy again without hesitation A++++
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: extremely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: be warned - this stuffed animal is extremely overpriced - as mentioned in other reviews, this is a tiny size, which cost $10 - $15
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: For some reason, I thought the plush was bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I thought the plush was bigger than pictured, but regardless - it was a Bday gift for my nephew and he was over the moon for it!
customer_reviews.author: AurNavLee

customer_reviews.title: cute but small
customer_reviews.text: extremely well made and cute. However, the given size is in centimeters, not inches, so it's probably half the size you think.
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon50

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday. It's as shown but MUCH smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMama

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it. The color is vibrant and the fur ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. The color is vibrant and the fur is really soft.
customer_reviews.author: raquel

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My kid love it. Everyone comments on it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super duper soft!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought but she loved it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Zarasouraus

customer_reviews.title: but other than that he's absolutely adorable and a great addition to my desk
customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than I expected and the face was slightly flat, but other than that he's absolutely adorable and a great addition to my desk. Pikachu is my favourite Pokémon.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy the Snivy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Pokemon fanatic! This plush toy is so soft and vivid!
customer_reviews.author: RockstarBaby

customer_reviews.title: The plush is very soft and good quality however
customer_reviews.text: The plush is very soft and good quality however.. I was expecting it to be a little bigger. It's really expensive for the size of this thing so be warned. I interpreted the dimensions to be in inches and they're not. Really no reason why a plush so small should cost $32.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very small. I would expect something bigger for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.author: StreetWorkout

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his little Pikachu, and it came in a nice little bag. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: 2CrochetHooks

customer_reviews.title: but my friends son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I thought, but my friends son loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Beartracks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and super soft. Not large, so be sure to check the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 6" Plush - Not 14" as it seems in description
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE...measurements are in VM not inches. This is actually only 6" inch doll that sold by others for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyShare18

customer_reviews.title: pika pika chuuuu
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and a pretty good size. It was a little smaller than I expected around 10 inches maybe. Turns out that is just right as a desk ornament.
customer_reviews.author: linuxpng

customer_reviews.title: WATCH OU FOR THE SIZE IS NOT IS INCHES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The size is totally deceiving it says 14" 19" 20" BUT it is NOT in INCHES!!!! A product sold in the USA???? I feel totally misled! it is very very tiny after all thus a rip off for the price!
customer_reviews.author: PBR

customer_reviews.title: I know my son will love it! We got it in a timely manner ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuffed animal is so soft! I know my son will love it! We got it in a timely manner with no problems at all. Can't wait to see his face on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Kessler

customer_reviews.title: but perfect size for a 2-3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Tail stays straight up, it's small, but perfect size for a 2-3 year old. My daughter loves her pikachu. Took awhile to get here though, best to buy and forget for a surprise to a child.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Purchased from Hannari store - very reputable seller. This Pikachu Plush is incredibly soft. My 5-year old goes nowhere without this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: N'west Mama

customer_reviews.title: This pikachu has a super cutie FACE!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Seller was great when I contacted him,my daughter is super happy with her pikachu.Came from Japan!(-->Miami) Shipping time was ideal!
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and so cute. A little pricey but my little guy loves him!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Weber

customer_reviews.title: The best Pikachu stuff animal, but at a expensive price
customer_reviews.text: By far cutest Pikachu stuff animal out there. Rip Off Price gouging for being a rare old item though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cute! Bought for son but I kinda want ...
customer_reviews.text: Too cute! Bought for son but I kinda want it. Smiles!!
customer_reviews.author: 80smiles

customer_reviews.title: much better than those sold at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: This Pikachu plush toy is very soft and well made, much better than those sold at Walmart. My son loves it! Shipping was reasonably fast from Japan. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Julisqin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and accurate to the description of item. From Japanese Pokémon center line, super soft. Would recommend. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plush Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Pikachu for my daughter. She loves him so much and has no problem taking him wherever we go. Best one on the market from what I can tell. No seam splitting, super soft and smooth to the touch. I recommend this for anyone looking for a plush Pikachu. Word of caution, it ships from over seas so expect a fair wait time before it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Selburg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the picture but you do not get your money's ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture but you do not get your money's worth it is super small and not worth $38
customer_reviews.author: Estevan R. Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Pikachu is really soft and beautiful, looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Plush, very well made. Great dealer. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Jose Javier Cuadrado Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I just love this Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: I just love this Pikachu, I've been looking for a Pikachu plush for a long time, but I am EXTREMELY picky and borderline OCD, so most Pikachu plush dolls I've seen are simply not good enough, they all look disfigured and VERY disappointing, so I took a chance after looking at the pictures and reading various reviews, and I am not disappointed at all, in fact I am VERY pleased. It is simply adorable! And very soft!
customer_reviews.author: Seneca Thurgood

customer_reviews.title: only because I had got my plushy and it was not like the pic my Pikachu is sitting and looks small
customer_reviews.text: I do not think these reviews are right, only because I had got my plushy and it was not like the pic my Pikachu is sitting and looks small, well quite a bit smaller then what it had said, just a warning on buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Good quality. A bit smallish but my 6 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tum

product_meta.title: Pokemon Center Original Running 8 Inch Pikachu Plush Doll
product_meta.description: Product Description World's most famous Pok?mon! Pikachu is a Pok?mon on the go! This running pose shows the most-loved Pok?mon in action.
feature_bullets: Official Nintendo Pokemon Center Limited Edition Collectible Plush
Pikachu is a Pok?mon on the go! This running pose shows the most-loved Pok?mon in action.
